sentences.en: Agent at the end of making dyeing tint of chemicals.
sentences.cn: 不扎染剂是能使不脱色底消色的一栽冻学品.

sentences.en: And their country weddings also show a tint of local convention.
sentences.cn: 丹麦的乡村婚礼也带有当地传统的色彩.

sentences.en: Brown trout is named for the red tint on its eyes.
sentences.cn: 赤眼鳟因其眼上有红色,故而得名.

sentences.en: Deep red , burgundy tint. Smoky , Musky , Spicy and Undergrowth.
sentences.cn: 颜色暗红, 有烟熏, 麝香等香料的味道.

sentences.en: Eyebrows can be tinted with the same dye.
sentences.cn: 眉毛可淡淡地染成相同的颜色。

sentences.en: How to take affection tint and objectively look upon problem?
sentences.cn: 如何不带情感色彩而客观地看待问题?

sentences.en: It was almost white having only a slight tint of yellow.
sentences.cn: 那几乎全是白色的,只稍微带着些许黄色.

sentences.en: Its large leaves often show a delicate purple tint.
sentences.cn: 它的大叶子往往带点紫色。

sentences.en: Screen tint percentages are provided to enable accurate color reproduction.
sentences.cn: 提供网屏色调百分比,以实现准确色彩复制.

sentences.en: She gave me instructions on how to apply the tint.
sentences.cn: 她告诉我如何使用染发剂.

sentences.en: The soils have a rusty red tint.
The water was glassy and motionless reflecting tint by tint of the Indian ink sky above.
sentences.cn: 水面波平如镜,深深淡淡地反映着天空墨水似的颜色.

sentences.en: This is the most restful tint for the eyes.
sentences.cn: 只有这种颜色才能使眼睛得到最大程度的休息.

sentences.en: Wedding show a tint of local convention in rural Denmark.
sentences.cn: 丹麦人的婚礼带有当地传统的色彩.

sentences.en: You can't get up that naturalness and artless rosy tint in after days.
sentences.cn: 你今后不再会有这种自然和朴实无华的红润脸色.

sentences.en: You've had a tint on your hair.

trans.tran_cn: 色彩，色泽，浅色，气息，迹象，痕迹
trans.tran_en: a small amount of a particular colour
to slightly change the colour of something, especially hair
